<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List all surveys"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of satisfaction surveys configured for the current site.

**Use Cases**
- Display available surveys in admin interface
- Find surveys to assign via rules
- Audit survey configuration across sites

**Workflow Example**
1. List surveys: GET /api/v1.0/surveys
2. Extract `Item[].SurveyId` for surveys you want to manage
3. View details: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey)
4. Check responses: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/responses/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey-responses)

**Supports**: Pagination (`$p`, `$s`), sorting (`$o`, `$d`), filtering.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0},"description":"Page index (zero-based). Use with `$s` for pagination."},{"name":"$s","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":100},"description":"Page size (number of records per page)."},{"name":"$o","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Sort expression: field name followed by optional direction (e.g., `CreatedDate desc`). Direction can be `asc`, `ascending`, `desc`, or `descending`. Default direction is ascending. See SurveySortField for valid field names.","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^(Name|CreatedDate|ModifiedDate|IsActive)(\\s+(asc|ascending|desc|descending))?$"},"example":"CreatedDate desc"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
